DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Individuals hemiparesis due stroke ; Both sex ; Agree sign free informed consent form . Exclusion criterion : Positive cutoff point Mini Mental State Examination ( MMSE ) less 11 point already correct schooling ; Ankle mobility reduce history fracture use ankle fastener ; Irreducible equine deformity ; Muscle strength level AT le 1 scale Kendall ; Patients report severe visual impairment ; Contraindications use transcranial direct current stimulation ( history seizure recurrent epilepsy , brain tumor stimulation site , metallic material implant brain ) ; Individuals cutaneous infection point application FECC FES ; Individuals present anesthesia hyperesthesia point application ECTS ; Individuals diagnose deep venous thrombosis ( DVT ) ; Individuals diagnose degenerative disease polyneuropathies .
